Title: Khamosh Adalat Jaari Hai
Actors: Nandita Das, Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande, Ajitesh Gupta, Yusuf Hussain
Plot: A mock trial during the rehearsal of a play quickly turns into a gripping drama about desire, gender issues, power and control, this is an adaptation of playwright Vijay Tendulkar's Shantata. Court Chalu Aahe (1963).
